claim: Hunter S. Thompson was not an author.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Hunter Stockton Thompson  (  July 18 , 1937 -- February 20 , 2005  )  was an American journalist and author , and the founder of the gonzo journalism movement .

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was not an author.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Matthew is also an author , he released his first book about the controversial Lisl Auman case in May 2010 , titled Dear Dr. Thompson : Felony Murder , Hunter S. Thompson and the Last Gonzo Campaign .

claim: Hunter S. Thompson was not an author.
premise_source_doc_sentence: With an introduction by Johnny Depp  (  a friend of Thompson , and portrayer of his author surrogate , Raoul Duke , in Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas  )  , the book stands as the only authorized biography of Hunter S. Thompson ever published .
